section.name: Software installation, accounting settings, chart of accounts, started capital.

body.section:
Keywords: Accounting software free.
Bob Brown from NY decided to start his own pizza business as sole proprietor. Bob's Pizza makes frozen pizza, so according NYS. sales taxable food he isn't a Sales Tax Vendor. Bob has read IRS 583 Starting a business and decide to elect:
calendar tax year
account Inventory to calculate costs that decrease his income tax, so he has to uses accrual accounting method.
FIFO method for pizza ingredients which cost can't be recognized (e.g. eggs) according IRS Accounting Periods and Methods
Bob chose Beige-Accounting because it's free, it does everything that he needs, it's easy to install and use. In addition it works as standalone WEB application on notebook and on Android tablet with same SQLite database. Bob can send database from notebook to tablet and vise versa. In the future (when it's needs) Bob may publish his software on cloud, Beige-Accounting is ready for high load job. You are able to make full database copy from SQlite database into high load (enterprise ready) MySql by using WEB-service (see Import database with WEB-service).
Bob installed Java (Oracle) and Google Chrome on his notebook (Chromium or Opera will do too). Bob downloaded file beigesoft-accountingoio-ajetty-bin.zip from central Maven repository https://search.maven.org/#search%7Cga%7C1%7Cg%3A%22org.beigesoft%22. He extracted ZIP archive then started JAR file beige-accounting-ajetty-jar-with-dependencies.jar by double click on it. You can start any JAR (if it's made as executable) in command line (synonyms - "terminal", "command prompt", "power shell") by type command: java -jar beige-accounting-ajetty-jar-with-dependencies.jar
Bob should see window like this:
Then he push button Start, after database has been created (it may takes several minutes for the first time to create database) he push button http://localhost:8080 - default browser will opened this address. At first Bob changed organization name in accounting settings:
Bob agreed all other settings include cost precision 4 digit places to reduce rounding error. Setting Current accounting year used for restricting year in new document or accounting entry.
Chart of accounts.
Bob change names of two accounts "started capital" and "retained earnings" and "is used" for his needs. Property "is used" means that whether account will presents in picker and in reports. Started capital.
At Jan.10 2016 Bob opened checking account #12125686 in Bank and deposit 40000USD. He make the first accounting entries from Menu Accounting - Input accounting Entries:
Main tips to use Beige-Accounting.
If you are editing a form but forget to create a dependent entity, e.g. Employee for document Wage, then you can open Beige-Accounting in another browser tab and create Employee, then go back and in picker press page (1 for example) to refresh it.
You can edit accounting entry description(only) in menu Accounting - Accounting Records
Several entities require for creating to enter ID manually. For customer/vendor/employee ID you can use its phone number (only numbers) or tax identification number. If you got error when you create such entity then probably ID is not unique.
Install Beige-Accounting on Android. Beige-Accounting doesn't comply new rules https://play.google.com/about/privacy-security/personal-sensitive/ that is sqlite archived non-encrypted databases are stored in "not-secure" place, it also doesn't uses encrypted (HTTPS) connection (although A-Jetty is not available through network). So Beige-Accounting was unpublished form Play Store, but it still available as APK installation file in central Maven repository https://search.maven.org/#search%7Cga%7C1%7Cg%3A%22org.beigesoft%22. SQlite and Java are already installed on Android. Last Android versions already have HTML5 dialog ready browser, otherwise install Chrome. Then you can install Beige Accounting APK file. After start it push button "Start" to start A-Jetty server, then push button "http://localhost:8080", default browser will be opened this address. If chrome isn't default browser, then make it default.
